channel.title: Vim on Walter Mays
channel.description: Recent content in Vim on Walter Mays

item.title: My Crazy Notetaking Setup
item.description: Without going into too much detail, let’s just say that I enjoy messing with my workflow far too much. I’m constantly trying to get a more efficient setup, a faster, newer, better, shinier plugin, and a more robust tool to use. I have an addiction for configuration. However, for the past few months, I’ve found a workflow that works pretty consistently for me. Note-Taking I take all of my notes in Vim.
